storyInfo: Hoederer, Ines, and W take control of Ulšulah, who could manipulate the Feranmut skeleton. The Sanguinarch of Vampires uses his blood to take command of the Feranmut skeleton, commanding it to a space beyond civilization.

attributes.text: For a few moments, perhaps more than a few moments, no Sarkaz dare to speak.
\nIt takes away all things, and shapes all things.

attributes.content: What... is that...?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The blessing the Sanguinarch left the Sarkaz hasn't faded, but just now—
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Could the Doctor have been talking about...?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.text: Blood rises from the spine of the Feranmut, apparently only a drop, but it draws all eyes.
\nIt leaves the intertwined bones, dancing in the dim cave, rising in the freshly sprinkled sunlight.
\nA drop of blood, just one drop of blood.
Pure blood—
\nGlorious blood.
\nIt has been wounded, it has been betrayed, it has been forgotten, to the point of being spurned.
\nFor millennia, the land called it a disaster, treated it as an enemy, trampled it until it abandoned its glory and defiled its body.
Teekaz became Sarkaz, their homeland lost.
\nToday, the blood of 'those with a homeland' returns from history.
\nAll men across the lands should pay tribute to it.
The bead of blood dissolves, and silence reigns.
\nNo explosions, no vibrations, no grand visions or chaotic whispers.
Even if blocked by the hills, all eyes turn toward Londinium.
\nAt this point, all the storms called by The Shard feel like nothing but harmless drizzle.
\nNow, what gathers atop the tower can no longer be called just a dark cloud.
\nThe storm has become a cradle.

attributes.content: ...Hoederer, W, look alive!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Do it!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: W, where are the bombs you buried? Hit your detonator, now!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Don't have to tell me twice!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: No guesses, Hoederer! We only take on opponents we know we can handle!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: ...I know.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: W's bombs tore through the defensive line. We've got a breakthrough. Tangled with them way too long.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Amiya and Logos went on ahead of us. They'll deal with the worst of our troubles.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: As for the others... follow the path they cleared and climb the Feranmut's bones with those gangways!
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Dammit, these guys—
attributes.name: Spine Guardian

attributes.content: Don't let them get any further! Commander Ulšulah is pulling up the gangways!
attributes.name: Spine Guardian

attributes.text: The trembling nerve bundles begin to close, and the bone gangways start to drift.
\nThe Feranmut has decided not to let anyone walk on its spine.

attributes.content: The traitors die here!
attributes.name: Spine Guardian

attributes.content: We'll take their corpses to the tent of the Nachzehrer King, to nourish our next victory!
attributes.name: Spine Guardian

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Spine Guardian

attributes.content: Buried mines under the bones. Feels pretty good.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hoederer, Ines, get ready—Shockwave incoming!
attributes.name: W

attributes.text: The rising airflow of the grand explosion sends the three mercenaries into the air.
\nHoederer adjusts his posture with some effort, looking down to see the cave being engulfed in flames.
\nThe Feranmut seems to sense something. It swings its body, its white tailbone slashing at the three like a whip.

attributes.content: W, three grenades, downward diagonal.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Good idea.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: This is the last time I play along with your explosive shenanigans.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.text: The red-haired Sarkaz kicks up dust, and the black-haired Caprinae weaves darkness.
\nThe scraps form beams and the shadows form steps.
\nAn invisible staircase, stinking of gunpowder, spirals upward and pierces the chest cavity of the hovering skeleton.
\nThe mercenaries rush into its hollow interior.

attributes.content: This way to the core of the skeleton.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Our target is Ulšulah. Find her, and we get control of this thing we're walking on.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Are you two sure we can 'get' this skeleton? Sounds a little reckless, almost like robbing a caravan.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We have to. Otherwise,, Amiya and Logos are fighting for nothing.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: So we open the car door, toss the driver out, grab the keys—'Bam, my car now'?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Did you see the illusions this thing made, moving between its bones, you still haven't figured anything out?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: This isn't some obscure story.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Should I have figured something out?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I forgot, you don't care to learn history.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: A few hundred years ago, the Sarkaz killed a Feranmut that almost destroyed Kazdel.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: After it fell, there were various claims as to where it ended up, and one of those was—
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: That its consciousness didn't die with it, that it was split up, sealed into a bunch of different items.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Now it seems that claim was probably at least partly true. As for the unconscious shell... it was carefully collected before this war.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: They spent a lot of effort to modify it, and sure enough, it's playing a big role in the war for the Military Commission.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: 'Different items', huh? Ulšulah never carried a pocket watch before. Not like she was ever on time in the Scar Market.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: But if her watch is holding the Feranmut's consciousness... it's probably already very fragmented.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: The skeleton we're standing on isn't exactly dead, but it doesn't have much more than basic nerve reflexes. Ulšulah can only guide those basic reactions.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: We just need to pay more attention to them—
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.text: A rain of bolts falls through the gaps in the bones, followed by the eerie glow of Sarkaz witchcraft.

attributes.content: Take cover!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Sure, just avoid the nerve bundles that can strike at you, and watch out for sudden bone spear thrusts, nothing to worry about.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: After all, this fella's been stripped down to nothing but bleached bones.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: But there's still you, Ulšulah.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You're more dangerous than this half-dead Feranmut.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Done with your important work?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I might be, if you weren't here to bother me.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Is this bitch the commander here? She's pretty rough on her own skeleton.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Those bolts are all stuck in the bones now.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Want me to help pull 'em out? I've got a pretty handy method.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*—It's that psycho!
attributes.name: Spine Guardian

attributes.content: Trying to kill my men right in front of me?
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Hoederer, you think too little of me.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.text: Dangerous and chaotic power gathers in Ulšulah's fingertips as she prepares to cast her Arts.
\nBut a moment before she can cast, a black shadow crawls up her ankle.

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.text: Ulšulah has to take a step to the right in order to shake off the persistent entanglement of the shadow.
\nHer Arts go out of control, and a red glow shoots out from the damaged seams of the spine.
\nThe sound of a muffled explosion booms from the distant cave wall.

attributes.content: You've gotten rusty, Ulšulah.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I guess you've been doing well for yourself in the Scar Market.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You're a bunch of survivors, I'll give you that.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Back in Kazdel, I made quiet bets with the old timers on how many of you would actually collect on those jobs you were taking.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: As long as I bet on Hoederer, Ines, and later the psycho W, I always made money.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Sounds to me like you owe us a big cut.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: That's the famous sharp tongue on this W. Haven't you learned anything from Ines?
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: This time, though, you took a wrong turn.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Two kings of the Royal Court are here, going all out, not to mention the 'King of Sarkaz'.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: This place is never gonna be a safe haven where you can escape the war, not the kind of place you can survive.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You heard about Theresis's trump card in Londinium?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Assuming... the consequences out there are way beyond anything anyone's ever seen before, you still think it's a fair price to pay for the Sarkaz to rebuild Kazdel?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...That's enough chit-chat.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Soldiers, end them here, while there's still time.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Major, look.
attributes.name: Spine Guardian

attributes.content: On the bones there...
attributes.name: Spine Guardian

attributes.text: Blood crawls along the bones, creeping toward them.
\nBlood is filling the place, overflowing the damaged gaps, connecting the long, cold body.

attributes.content: It's the Sanguinarch.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Looks like he's ready.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.text: It... begins to grow warmer.
\nPower accumulates in the bones again, the spine sways left and right, audibly creaking.
\nThe Feranmut resumes its roving.

attributes.content: So much blood...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Ulšulah, where did all this blood come from?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: As if you need to ask. It's courtesy of that homicidal Sanguinarch. He slaughtered the place clean.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: No, their wrists...
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.text: Ulšulah and her men all have bleeding wounds on their wrists.
\nDrip, drip... it starts as beads of blood, then turns into ribbons, then rivers.
\nHow much blood is in a human body?
\nThe blood flowing out of the guards joins with the bloodstains spreading over the bleached bones.

attributes.content: 'I offer Your Highness my blood, Prince of the Crimson Court.'
attributes.name: Spine Guardian

attributes.content: 'May you hunt unimpeded.'
attributes.name: Spine Guardian

attributes.content: 'Let our blood form for you a swift chariot.'
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Ulšulah, stop! Have you lost your marbles?!
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: The Feranmut... it's about to move again!
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The currents of history might be about to sweep this place away!
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: That bitch wants to go down with us—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I am not controlling it.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Blood has replaced muscle, tendons, and marrow.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Isn't that enough to control it?
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.text: The guards' exposed skin is now visibly pallid. Ulšulah's complexion is also looking worse.
\nFinally, the flow stops.
A Sarkaz soldier will give everything for his liege, not only his blood.
\nTheir skin shrivels, and finally, they collapse.

attributes.content: It's been an honor and a privilege, men, you stood with me to the end. We will meet again among the myriad souls.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: I told you, this skeleton isn't a place to escape, it isn't a place to survive anymore.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Hurry! We need to take cover in the cabin!
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The illusions are already manifesting, we don't know where they might go!
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: —It's creating waves! Look out!
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Ugh, where does the Vampire want to take us?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Hoederer?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'm here, with her.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: She's lost too much blood. Whether or not she lives is all up to her now.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You might as well leave me outside, Hoederer. I'd rather die with my men.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: You've killed so many 'old friends', there's no way you suddenly grew a heart today.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: We can use you.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I told you, the skeleton's out of my control now.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: You also said you're loyal to the Commission.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: If you think the Military Commission is the hope for Kazdel to become a nation... then why is that guy calling himself a regent?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Why does he need Theresa? Why does he think winning this war will secure a future for Kazdel?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: What is Theresis thinking?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Whatever, we'll talk after we take down this Feranmut.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: What... are you going to do?
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Our goal hasn't changed.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: We're going home.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Heh... home.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: That was supposed to be the skeleton's last mission.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: It has a name. We codenamed it Lifebone.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Nobody uses it much, but when General Manfred named it... he was talking just like you.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Just like me? Manfred...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: We're enemies, so I'm done with questions. I'm just gonna wait to die.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Well, heh, I guess making it to today is a kind of an answer.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: You really think General Manfred is blind? That he doesn't know what you're up to?
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: I mean, you can only talk about going home if you manage to survive your run-in with the Sanguinarch.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Hoederer
Hoederer
attributes.content: So—

attributes.name: Hoederer
attributes.content: I'm gonna borrow your watch.

attributes.text: Perhaps due to her blood loss, Ulšulah is basically powerless to resist. Hoederer takes the lovely pocket watch without any trouble. Its cold metal case is engraved with intricate witchcraft runes.
\nThe watch is ticking backwards.
\nA murmur that no one else hears fills his mind for a moment.

attributes.content: It really is... louder than I imagined.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.text: Hoederer grits his teeth and leaves behind the loud whispers.
\nHe searches within it for the true, dormant consciousness of the Feranmut.

attributes.content: Feranmut who wanders this land, you are not dead, you've decided to continue your existence in a different way.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You're still here, aren't you?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.text: At the center of the disaster, the silent Feranmut slowly swims. Where it wanders, there is only ruined emptiness.
\nThe past lifts it, and the future is separated by it.
\nA figure stands in front of it.

attributes.content: Stop, Feranmut.
attributes.name: Young Vampire?

attributes.content: You are about to step into Kazdel, our city. The people here refuse your visit.
attributes.name: Young Vampire?

attributes.content: Choose another path.
attributes.name: Young Vampire?

attributes.content: Or else, the Sarkaz will slaughter you.
attributes.name: Young Vampire?

attributes.content: This is your only warning.
attributes.name: Young Vampire?

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Young Vampire?

attributes.content: My brother directed us to forbid its advance, to obey the will of the King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Young Vampire?

attributes.content: Sanguine Court, to me.
attributes.name: Young Vampire?

attributes.text: Powerful witchcraft condenses in the Vampire's hands, and a giant crimson spear falls from the sky.
One massive wound after another pierces it.
\nThe silent Feranmut finally speaks, as if waking from a dream.
'Kazdel...'
\n'Oh... I may have slept for too long...'
\n'Kazdel... When... did it become a city?'
\n'Your... 'King of Sarkaz'... is he not your sole chosen leader...?'
\n'Why is he not... standing before me?'
An image that all have forgotten is shattered by the moving Feranmut.
\nIt has not roamed in centuries.
It gently moves its fins, now only bleached bones, pushing through layer after layer of space.
\nThe one who once killed it now bestows warmth upon it again.
\nThe skeleton searches for a suitable place to stop.
\nUntil finally—
The massive skeleton hovers over an endless sea.
\nThe cave, the battle, and even the slowly rising sun are nowhere to be seen.
Instead, there is only...
\nA calm sky, a calm sea, and calm... stars.
All the cruelty that occurs on the continent seems to have never existed here.
\nThis is beyond the horizon, beyond civilization.
This is what remains of the skeleton for the Prince of Blood to find at last—
\nAn untouchable realm.
The crimson river connects with a dark blue nerve and intertwines tightly.
\nThe slender murderer closes his eyes and feels the pounding rhythm of his victim.
\nWith blood for reins, he harnesses the creature that can only wander through history.

attributes.content: After those illusory visions and memories of the past, you've indeed brought me a more... valuable scene.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Why don't the two of you, in the face of such a scene, fizzle those frankly laughable Arts in your hands?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Have a look around, take some time to admire it all—
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: This... is the tomb I have chosen for you.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: It was daytime just a moment ago, but here...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A dark night, and an endless sea.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The stars are changing.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I've never heard of any place like this, not in any records, not in any legends.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: So, this must be...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Distant enough, yes.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I do wonder how far we are from Kazdel now.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: This land they all call Terra, is it too vast, or is it too small?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Amiya, be careful.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: His blood... it's sublimating.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: He awakened his blood with that witchcraft.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Don't talk like an outblood, Banshee.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You know, I treat purebloods as equals.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Perhaps, when compared to the Crimson Court, which has spent eons seeking purity, you have been more deeply influenced by Originium.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But, well, among the Sarkaz, you are indeed quite... formidable.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Come, let's not be stingy with my blessing, you cannot reject my gift. Now that I've awakened your power, you are finally worthy of facing me.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Let me hear the screech of your knell, if it can still darken the moonlight.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.text: Crimson ripples spread, and at this moment, the sky is no longer the sky, nor is the sea the sea.
\nThey are only refractions of blood, reflections of blood.
The Sanguinarch smiles faintly, a blood soul pumping like a heart in his palm, reflecting the face of the young Banshee in a structure as deep as life itself.
And then, the blood soul shatters.

attributes.content: 'I write, therefore, I command.'
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: 'The night conceals me from death.'
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Another incantation...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Another of your shallow incantations.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You have talent, no doubt about that. The flapping of your lips and the doodles of your bone pen are enough to humiliate the so-called Originium 'Arts' of common people.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: And yet, why do you resist your heritage so?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Show me your true self, King of the Court, Banshee!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Duq'arael, Sanguinarch of Vampires, Prince of all Blood, demands you show your true self!
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Enough, Vampire!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hold on, Logos—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Black Arts erupt from the girl's hand, parting the sea of blood.
\nBut the blood does not yield, it roars.
\nThe King of Sarkaz's Arts dissolve and shatter, and the red surges even more intensely.

attributes.content: Oh, King of Sarkaz. I nearly forgot you were here.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Cautus, King.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Look at you, you didn't receive even a scrap of my boon.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Cautus blood, tedious and ordinary. No matter how hard I try to scrape something together, I can't find a shred of talent or power.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I can't even say that your blood is mixed or impure, as those adjectives still imply an expectation of return to purity.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But you...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: There are chaotic bloodlines I approve of, but they are without a doubt all 'formidable' or 'magnificent'.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: But what do you have? A laughable motivation? A shallow conviction?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I don't have to answer you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I just have to defeat you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is this our King of Sarkaz? Just stealing a bit of attainment from another, chaotic, and disorderly.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Nothing even on the level of the Banshee's little tricks born of his rebellious mind.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: —Even less than that pair of siblings.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Amiya.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Don't let him provoke you. As it stands, his power is still growing.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: We need to end this fast.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We need to get back under clear skies.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In the past...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I once slew a so-called 'King of Sarkaz', and it wasn't particularly difficult.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: And I suspect your end will be the same, this time.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You question me with black blades.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I answer you with the gift of death.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires
